name: Simple Hexagon
description:
A SuperHexagon fan game with reversed roles: Tap on the obstacles to clear and simplify the level, so that the character in the center can survive for 60 seconds and win!

A game done with Godot in a weekend for the #StopWaitingForGodot jam, with the theme "Keep it simple".

  • Game by @albertnez
  • Music by V E U S K E M I N I 雄 志
  • Original SuperHexagon by @terrycavanagh
